definition: enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
day/sky/heaven
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
(long) time/(long) duration of time
see 友誼地久天長|友谊地久天长[You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2]
pinyin: You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3

sentences.english: I hope we can spend just as many as more years together.
sentences.chinese: 希望我们能天长地久，永远厮守在一起。

sentences.english: If I see you next to never. How can I say forever?
sentences.chinese: 如果我看不到你的身影，又怎能说天长地久？

sentences.english: Do you believe in perpetual love in this secular world?
sentences.chinese: 在这个世俗的世界你还相信有天长地久的爱情吗？

sentences.english: Friendship does not last forever, and no highest power of love.
sentences.chinese: 没有天长地久的友情，更没有海枯石烂的爱情。

sentences.english: Two people together is not to ever do?
sentences.chinese: 两个人在一起不就是为了天长地久吗？

sentences.english: If i see you next to neve , How can i say forever?
sentences.chinese: 如果我看不到你的身影，又怎能说天长地久？

sentences.english: Sometimes people sing an old song called Auld Lang Syne.
sentences.chinese: 有时人们唱一首叫做“友谊天长地久”的老歌曲。

sentences.english: Count to accompany you through the maintenance, deduce belong to us forever.
sentences.chinese: 细数陪你走过的细水长流，演绎属于我们的天长地久。

sentences.english: Sincere friendship is everlasting and unchanging .
Often mutually deceives how can the sentiment for ever and ever?
sentences.chinese: 时常互相欺骗的感情又怎能天长地久呢？

sentences.english: Cherish to own, gratitude can last forever.
sentences.chinese: 珍惜才能拥有，感恩才能天长地久。

sentences.english: Love is eternal, love is easy to be old, sincere friendship enduring as the universe.
sentences.chinese: 亲情不灭，爱情易老，真挚的友情天长地久。

sentences.english: That I thought would last somehow.
sentences.chinese: 你我的情义将天长地久。

sentences.english: Ever think of the everlasting, nothing is truly meet by chance.
sentences.chinese: 曾经认为的天长地久，实在不外是萍水相逢。

sentences.english: I'd like propose a toast to the lasting friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我建议为我们天长地久的友谊干杯。

sentences.english: First I need your hand, then 4ever can begin.
sentences.chinese: 我需要牵着你的手，才能告诉你什么是天长地久。

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to stay together/to rely on one another
from dawn to dusk/all the time
romance/love (romantic)/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4]
true love
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
to love each other
enduring while the world lasts (idiom, from Laozi); eternal/for ever and ever (of friendship, hate etc)/also written 天長地久|天长地久
see 天荒地老[tian1 huang1 di4 lao3]
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
